trans-unit.source: What is Azure Active Directory?
trans-unit.target: What is Azure Active Directory?

trans-unit.source: Use Azure Active Directory to extend your existing on-premises identities into the cloud or develop Azure AD integrated applications.
trans-unit.target: Use Azure Active Directory to extend your existing on-premises identities into the cloud or develop Azure AD integrated applications.

trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) is Microsoft’s multi-tenant cloud based directory and identity management service.
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) is Microsoft’s multi-tenant cloud based directory and identity management service.

trans-unit.source: For IT Admins, Azure AD provides an affordable, easy to use solution to give employees and business partners single sign-on (SSO) access to <linkText>thousands of cloud SaaS Applications</linkText><title></title> like Office365, Salesforce.com, DropBox, and Concur.
trans-unit.target: For IT Admins, Azure AD provides an affordable, easy to use solution to give employees and business partners single sign-on (SSO) access to <linkText>thousands of cloud SaaS Applications</linkText><title></title> like Office365, Salesforce.com, DropBox, and Concur.

trans-unit.source: For application developers, Azure AD lets you focus on building your application by making it fast and simple to integrate with a world class identity management solution used by millions of organizations around the world.
trans-unit.target: For application developers, Azure AD lets you focus on building your application by making it fast and simple to integrate with a world class identity management solution used by millions of organizations around the world.

trans-unit.source: Azure AD also includes a full suite of identity management capabilities including multi-factor authentication, device registration, self-service password management, self-service group management, privileged account management, role based access control, application usage monitoring, rich auditing and security monitoring and alerting.
trans-unit.target: Azure AD also includes a full suite of identity management capabilities including multi-factor authentication, device registration, self-service password management, self-service group management, privileged account management, role based access control, application usage monitoring, rich auditing and security monitoring and alerting.

trans-unit.source: These capabilities can help secure cloud based applications, streamline IT processes, cut costs and help assure corporate compliance goals are met.
trans-unit.target: These capabilities can help secure cloud based applications, streamline IT processes, cut costs and help assure corporate compliance goals are met.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, with just <linkText>four clicks</linkText><title></title>, Azure AD can be integrated with an existing Windows Server Active Directory, giving organizations the ability to leverage their existing on-premises identity investments to manage access to cloud based SaaS applications.
trans-unit.target: Additionally, with just <linkText>four clicks</linkText><title></title>, Azure AD can be integrated with an existing Windows Server Active Directory, giving organizations the ability to leverage their existing on-premises identity investments to manage access to cloud based SaaS applications.

trans-unit.source: If you are an Office365, Azure or Dynamics CRM Online customer, you might not realize that you are already using Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: If you are an Office365, Azure or Dynamics CRM Online customer, you might not realize that you are already using Azure AD.

trans-unit.source: Every Office365, Azure and Dynamics CRM tenant is actually already an Azure AD tenant.
trans-unit.target: Every Office365, Azure and Dynamics CRM tenant is actually already an Azure AD tenant.

trans-unit.source: Whenever you want you can start using that tenant to manage access to thousands of other cloud applications Azure AD integrates with!
trans-unit.target: Whenever you want you can start using that tenant to manage access to thousands of other cloud applications Azure AD integrates with!

trans-unit.source: <center><linkText>Azure AD Connect Stack</linkText> </center>
trans-unit.target: <center><linkText>Azure AD Connect Stack</linkText> </center>

trans-unit.source: The multi-tenant, geo-distributed, high availability design of Azure AD means that you can rely on it for your most critical business needs.
trans-unit.target: The multi-tenant, geo-distributed, high availability design of Azure AD means that you can rely on it for your most critical business needs.

trans-unit.source: Running out of 28 data centers around the world with automated failover, you’ll have the comfort of knowing that Azure AD is highly reliable and that even if a data center goes down, copies of your directory data are live in at least two more regionally dispersed data centers and available for instant access.
trans-unit.target: Running out of 28 data centers around the world with automated failover, you’ll have the comfort of knowing that Azure AD is highly reliable and that even if a data center goes down, copies of your directory data are live in at least two more regionally dispersed data centers and available for instant access.

trans-unit.source: For more details, see <linkText>Service Level Agreements</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more details, see <linkText>Service Level Agreements</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Your organization can use Azure AD to improve employee productivity, streamline IT processes, improve security and cut costs in many ways:
trans-unit.target: Your organization can use Azure AD to improve employee productivity, streamline IT processes, improve security and cut costs in many ways:

trans-unit.source: Quickly adopt cloud services, providing employees and partners with an easy single-sign on experience powered by Azure AD’s fully automated SaaS app access management and provisioning services capabilities.
trans-unit.target: Quickly adopt cloud services, providing employees and partners with an easy single-sign on experience powered by Azure AD’s fully automated SaaS app access management and provisioning services capabilities.

trans-unit.source: Empower employees with access to world class cloud apps and service and self-services capabilities from wherever they need to work on the devices they love to use.
trans-unit.target: Empower employees with access to world class cloud apps and service and self-services capabilities from wherever they need to work on the devices they love to use.

trans-unit.source: Easily and securely manage employee and vendor access to your corporate social media accounts.
trans-unit.target: Easily and securely manage employee and vendor access to your corporate social media accounts.

trans-unit.source: Improve application security with Azure AD multifactor authentication and conditional access.
trans-unit.target: Improve application security with Azure AD multifactor authentication and conditional access.

trans-unit.source: Implement consistent, self-service application access management, empowering business owners to move quickly while cutting IT costs and overhead.
trans-unit.target: Implement consistent, self-service application access management, empowering business owners to move quickly while cutting IT costs and overhead.

trans-unit.source: Monitor application usage and protect your business from advanced threats with security reporting and monitoring.
trans-unit.target: Monitor application usage and protect your business from advanced threats with security reporting and monitoring.

trans-unit.source: Secure mobile (remote) access to on-premises applications.
trans-unit.target: Secure mobile (remote) access to on-premises applications.

trans-unit.source: If you are an IT admin:
trans-unit.target: If you are an IT admin:

trans-unit.target: Read our “Getting started with Azure AD” for tips and tricks on getting an Azure AD tenant up and running fast

trans-unit.target: If you are a developer:
